column5: I would appreciate anyone providing me a web site address that permits the viewing of satellite images of Ontario and Quebec. Like many here, a group of us are scheduled for a trout fishing trip 25-27 April and we're concerned about whether or not ice will be off the lakes. Thanks in advance.
http://eosweb.ssec.wisc.edu/cgi-bin/eosdb.cgi  More can be found here.  Hopefully the areas you want are there.
Can't forget this one..  http://www.algonquinpark.on.ca/news/ice-out.php  cheers HD
